H0.text: Davy Crocket was killed at the Alamo, which other famous American pioneer died in the same action. Kit Carson

H1.text: Davy Crocket was killed at the Alamo, which other famous American pioneer died in the same action. John Jacob Astor

H2.text: Davy Crocket was killed at the Alamo, which other famous American pioneer died in the same action. Daniel Boone

H3.text: Davy Crocket was killed at the Alamo, which other famous American pioneer died in the same action. Jim Bowie

A4.text: Bowie died on March 6, 1836, with the other Alamo defenders.
